title: North Esports is looking for a D5+ Top Laner!!
body:
**North Esports is looking for a Top Laner to join us in preparation for Season 6! **
If you are a Diamond 5+ Top laner and have the experience and drive to make it to the OPL then follow us on twitter @northesportsne and we will be in contact! We currently have a full roster (besides top) that are all Diamond players with lots of experience so apply today!

North Decos - Manager of North Esports

replies.body:
Hey, Ill be interested. 
Summoner Name - F4F Predator
Email - hamoun_is@hotmail.com
Highest I've ranked D1, currently D5, couldnt play cause of school but now im finished :)
